attributes.action: make ALL MP's give up the use of their cars for a month and use public transport (including when in their own constituencies).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The aim of the petition is to show that outside of London there is an inadequate public transport service. If the government want people to use public transport then there MUST be a better service available in ALL constituencies

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
